item.title: How to i add thieving stall in different area
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

what ever source you have…DEOB 317 im guessing…

but go into Client.java
Search “makeglobalobject”
look for the id…this could be found by going to a 317object just look for the id…in Globalobject
Change the x - y cords what would be the first to set of numbers…to what ever you want…

makeGlobalObject(X Cord, Y Cord, ID,0,10);

Read full topic

okay its very simple listen to everyone. go the stall u want. right click and get the id for the stall. go into client.java search for it. and change the coords

item.title: How to i add thieving stall in different area
item.dc:creator: @bobby11 bobby1
item.description:
@bobby11 wrote:

[quote=“j19283746, post:4, topic:349586”]Its not going to say thieving. And also, attk mast3r, The stalls arent always located in makeglobalobject… Take Ardougne for example. So, bobby1, My suggestion to you is to go to client.java and look for makeglobalobject. Then, find the code of the stall you want to make. Also, you will need the coords. Put it in makeglobalobject form. Then, your gonna have to add something else in. Forgot where it goes… but its like…
if (object = 1234) {
sendMessage(“I am happy”);
addSkillXP(50000, 8);
}[/quote]yes i got stalls in ardougne too i want to put them in a certain place in cammy. but idk how i went to makeglobalobject but i dont know which codes are the stalls.i dont want to delete something random.

Read full topic

Put it in makeglobalobject form. Then, your gonna have to add something else in. Forgot where it goes… but its like…

sendMessage(“I am happy”);

}
